column4: I have just put a DVD in my ubuntu PC and it says it doesnt have the correct things installed to play it.. is there a program I need to install or something?
cant someone just tell me an app to install?
I just wanna watch a dvd I don't wanna read pages and pages about formats
your answer is in those pages...if you're unwilling to put forth the effort to read the help you're given then I'm not really sure what to tell you :-\
